comments.body: i'm trying to be explicit to the form used in play, including the :

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +253,257 @@    Keyword
        The main expressions that make up Ansible, which apply to playbook objects
        (Play, Block, Role and Task). For example 'vars:' is a keyword that lets
        you define variables in the scope of the playbook object it is applied to.

comments.body: Thanks for clarifying that, that makes more sense to me in the use of `role` keyword for instance.
